key_title: Key to the genera of Zygophyllaceae

Key to the families of Dicotyledons

source.author: Jeanes, J.A.
source.title: Zygophyllaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: Modified from: Jeanes, J.A. (1999). Zygophyllaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Leaves opposite or alternate, paripinnate; leaflets more than 2, usually hairy; fruit a schizocarp separating into 5 (sometimes fewer by abortion) woody mericarps, with spines and tubercules
Leaves opposite, simple, often 2-lobed or with 2 leaflets, glabrous; fruit a 4- or 5-angled capsule, lacking spines or tubercles
